sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for particle size analysis using a sieve shaker.
sections.scope: Applicable to powder analysis in the Pharmacognosy laboratory.
procedure: Ensure sieves are clean and dry.
Arrange sieves in descending order of mesh size.
Place the sample powder on the top sieve.
Fix the sieve stack on the shaker.
After completion, collect and weigh retained powder from each sieve.
sections.precautions: Ensure proper fixing of sieves. Do not overload the sieve stack.
